trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Poulsbo
There were no other sightings in Poulsbo on or around November 26th 2012
divs: sighting details i was unloading a car off a tow dolly bout 8-9 pm with my freind matt and to the nw i see a bright light(white)and dimmer light green next to it not a nav light ive seen the new led nav lights this was pale green and hovering i point it out to matt and he s like so what and so i go on unloading the car from the tow dolly and we drive off to matts cause now there s no room in the the drivway for the van and dolly so on the way to matts to drop of the van and dolly we come around the corner and there it is like a mile away hovering in the same? spot i dont think it moved it would be about the same place to the nw so i slow down a bit theres no place to pull off so i go anothe 1\4 mile or so and in kitsap heritage park i pull of into the turn lane for the park and stop and open the door and look at it about 30 seconds maybe a minute and a half later(i was gonna sit there and watch this silent hovering thing till it did somthing cause if it where a helicopter at this distance 1\2 mile id a heard somthintg)low and behold this thing started tword me 500- 750 feet above and 40 50 mph 1\2 mile away and it took maybe 45 seconds or so because i watched it hover longer than i saw it in flight when it was right over head i heard a slight hum and when it got over to the other side of my van my curiosity was satisfied matt said it flew off to the east tword north seattle and you could still see the white light in the middle and the pale green lights on either side leaving the impresion the lights where on the bottom delta\chevron shape craft and ive since have seen the same craft in the area 8-11 pm time frame did nt think mutch of it kinda theres that thing again that beemer i was towing needs the engine re gasketed bout $150 bucks and couple days of my labor i decided to look at your website i think sun-mon and a girl and her father saw the same thing and it only then sent a chill up my spine so im now getting round to filling out this report i could see how people could se this thing and think it was an airplane a star or a helicopter because only if you stop and watch it for a while do you realise the flight characteristic is strange maybe more people will see it and read this my general impression creeeeeped out whoever whatever was in controll of this thing is trying to blend in and the silent hover to moving thing after me stopping to look at it is toooo f#@$! mutch
Summary: white light flanked by 2 light green lights hoverd then slowly flew away
